explains: v. 类似于，相当于；通信；相一致，符合（correspond 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: corresponding author n. 通讯作者；联系人
corresponding element 对应边；对应元
corresponding bank 代理行；往来银行；业务联系银行

sentences.en: A change in the money supply brings a corresponding change in expenditure.
sentences.cn: 货币供应量的改变随即引起支出的相应改变。

sentences.en: The rise in interest rates was not reflected in a corresponding rise in the dollar.
sentences.cn: 利率上调没有反映在相应的美元增值上。

sentences.en: He has got both corresponding education and talents and is by all means equal to this job.
sentences.cn: 他既接受过相应的教育又有天赋，当然可以胜任这份工作。
